reviewText: I am a lifelong Bears fan so I loved this DVD.  The Football Life series is a great series for NFL fans.
Huband loved this movie, he is a big fan of Ditka's.
Dikta' football life is excellent. From the early beginning and through his playing career it covers it all. a-z we'll done.

The biography of Da Coach in video. A story of a great tight end and coach. It is a typical NFL Films masterpiece. The footage of his days as a player are demonstrative of the player that I remember him as.
Fantastic. Great story about the player and Da Coach of the Chicago Bears. Well worth the money, a must for Bears Fans
